name: PigCoin
description: You control a piggy bank in this isometric game where touching the piggy bank makes the player follow the touch of the users finger. At the start of the game there will be a set amount of money that the piggy bank must catch in order to advance to the next level. During the game, clouds make it rain coins, bombs, and hammers so that the player can catch the coins and avoid getting broken. There will be sound effects such as pig oinks, coins dropping from the cloud, coins getting collected, and music with each scene. As the game progresses the clouds drop more coins and after a certain stage the levels get harder. The player may save their progress and use their collected coin currency to purchase fun colored skins, which can be equipped and used during the next time the user plays.The user interface on the top left side consists of a score, a high score, and a goal (displayed in yellow). The user interface on the right side consists of the players life, the level, and a pause button. At the start of the game, the title "Pig Coin" is displayed. The game will end when the user quits the application. Don't Forget To Save your progress!!! Have fun coin collecting! This game does not require real currency for anything.
